text: Ignacy Gogolewski (17 June 1931 – 15 May 2022) was a Polish actor. He appeared in more than 30 movies. He was born in Ciechanów, Mazowieckie, Poland. He starred in Three Stories (1953), Tonight a City Will Die (1961), The Codes (1966), Stawka większa niż życie (1967) and Boleslaw Smialy (1972). From 1954 to 1964, he was married to actress Katarzyna Łaniewska. He died on 15 May 2022, aged 90.Zmarł aktor Ignacy Gogolewski ==References== ==Other websites== * *Ignacy Gogolewski at culture.pl Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Polish television actors
title: Ignacy Gogolewski
